description:
Tsuna and his crew have had enough with the training. Tsuna is still unable to open his box, and the others are worn out from the damage done by Lambo’s Box Weapon. On top of that, Kyoko and Haru ask Tsuna and the others to share the secret they’ve been keeping from the girls. Reborn pretends to not know anything because he doesn’t want to tell the girls anything about the Mafia or Byakuran. But the girls are adamant, and they decide to boycott all household chores until they are informed. Keeping up with their training is hard enough, and now Tsuna and the other guys will have to start cooking and cleaning themselves…
Source: crunchyroll
